resources.string: The Qiku R&D team is devoted to improving user experience. The latest system update package (version No. %s) is available. Please update your system.

"\u0009\u0009 Qiku prioritizes user experience. The version will be upgraded to the latest Android version, which will bring a better user experience. The update package is large, so fees will be generated if you use a data network. It is recommended to upgrade software using WLAN. \u0009\u0009 This update is important, so the system automatically performs data backup before the upgrade. Version No.: %s"
Tip: System update does not affect your personal data.
Note: You can also set the downloading option under Settings > About phone > System update options; downloading the system update package may incur data fees.
Remind me to download in one hour

"Qiku update package (version No. %s) has been prepared. Selecting an update will immediately restart the phone and start the system update. It takes several minutes to complete a system update. All phone functions including emergency call cannot be used at that time. Updating does not affect your personal data. The device will automatically restart after the upgrade. Do not power off the device during the update. "
The system has detected a version update and is downloading the upgrade package.
Your phone software is the latest version.
Sorry, there is no package. Please wait.
We will inform you if there is a package.
Your phone software is the latest version.
Your phone is updating the system. Please wait.
No network. Please try again after connecting the network
The user has canceled the download.
The user canceled the download while the data packets were being downloaded.
Error downloading the data packet. Update failed.
Update failed due to improper installation.
Failed to install the system upgrade package, possibly because your phone is rooted. You can use the confirm button to enter the update setting interface and cancel the automatic update check.
The user has canceled the update.
System update downloading failed due to the insufficient system space. You are advised to restart your phone and try again.
You can enter system update through the notification launcher later.
WLAN has not been started. Please start WLAN.
Please make sure that your WLAN is connected to the Internet and try again.
Wait a minute. The system update package will be downloaded soon.
The update package has been downloaded. The system is checking the update package. Please wait. Do not power off the device during the check.
Data space shortage,please clean up space first.
The password is incorrect. Please enter it again.
The network has a problem. Please enter the password again.
The project baseline is not deployed or access has timed out. Please enter it again.

"Tip: The wireless upgrade test server is used for the internal version test only. Once the test server is used to test the upgrade, the formal server upgrade may be unusable unless a whole unit upgrade is performed. When the server issued value is checked, the request server address will take precedence over the server issued value. If the server address previously selected by the user is different from the server issued address, the address will automatically switch to the server address issued by the server. If the server issued value option is not checked, the user can actively select a server."
OTA function test, used for the engineer test only
Note: When either super mode or optional mode is selected, OTA will perform a system upgrade in the respective mode. This option is valid only to test the server.
Updating...Please wait. Do not power off the device during the update.
Insufficient phone memory. Please perform a system update after inserting the T card.
Insufficient phone memory. Please perform a system update after restarting the phone.
The upgrade package needs to be downloaded to the T card. Please perform a system update after inserting the T card.
Insufficient T card space. Please perform a system update after deleting some content.
The T card has been unplugged. Please insert it again.
Insufficient space on local directory. Please perform a system update making at least 80MB available.
The upgrade package will be downloaded to the phone memory.
The upgrade package will be downloaded to the SD card.
The previous upgrade process was interrupted. To optimize your phone system, restart and re-upgrade your phone.
The system has been upgraded successfully. To enjoy a better user experience, please upgrade the communication module at the service outlet.
WAP network connection failed. Please switch to the NET network and download the update package again.
To ensure normal progress of the system upgrade, please connect the charger to charge the phone to the battery level above %30 before the update.
Low battery, recharge the phone and update the system.
The network is disconnected. Downloading will proceed when the network is available.
Because your phone is international roaming, it is not recommended to detect upgrade
Low battery, recharge the phone and update the system.
Are you sure you want to download it?

"Your system needs to be optimized. The system will run more smoothly and your phone will become more stable after optimization. System optimization does not affect your personal data. It takes several minutes to optimize. Do not power off your phone during optimization."
This password is consistent with the password set by the server.
Switching to the NET network...Using the NET network may incur data fees.
It is used for testing only. Checking it may lead to version rollback. This option is valid only to test the server.
LC (it indicates the mass production version; OTA uses the formal server by default)
CS (it indicates the test version; OTA uses the test server by default)
Not defined (OTA will set the default server according to the DM label)
When auto check is enabled, the system will automatically check the update every three days
When there is a system update available, the system will ask the user whether to download it
When there is an available system update, it will be automatically downloaded to update the system
System update is automatically downloaded when WLAN is available
A confirmation prompt is displayed when your phone needs to be restarted in the system update process
Auto downloading the WLAN has been closed
You can set the system update in Settings > About phone > System update options
Automatically check the update time next time
You have completed the download process
The latest update contains multiple update items. You can download it immediately to update the system.
Touch Update now to update the system.
"Note: 1. System update does not affect your personal data. 2. Downloading the system update package may incur data fees."
This dialog box will appear again %s later.
The upgrade package is being downloaded. You can check progress in the notification bar
Your server address is the pre-test server already.
Your server address has switched to the pre-test server.
Your server address has switched to the test server.
Your server address has switched to the formal server.
This application will lead to data usage in the system update package download process. For the specific charging standard, please consult the related operator.
Do not remind me next time
There is system update. Please upgrade the system.
To update the system, restart the phone.
Currently you are using mobile data. Clicking Download now will lead to high data usage. You are advised to download the version in the Wi-Fi environment.
Are you sure want to check the update?
You are currently using mobile data,Check will consume some traffic, we recommend that you download in WIFI environment.
You choose is not the system updates, please choose again upgrade package zip format
Please check your network is available
Server is busy, please try again later
Upgrading security risks,do not use package not come from QiKu, it may cause privacy information leaks and other security risks
Allows devices to automatically upgrade in the free time
System partition check fails, if the upgrade fails, please go to QiKu community Download the complete SD card upgrade package.
System partition file check does not pass, the upgrade may fail, it is recommended to go to QiKu community Download the complete upgrade package
Checking process fail, the results unknown
Upgrade to the 6.0 system, the current input fingerprints will fail, please change the privacy system of entry, then upgrade

System cache space is full, please clear the cache to continue, steps: Shut down your device, then long press the power button and volume UP into the recovery mode, select Clear data in the main menu, clear the cache in the clear data menu, restart the phone

System cache space is full, please clear the cache to continue, steps: Shut down your device, then long press the power button and volume UP and volume DOWN into the recovery mode, select Clear data in the main menu, clear the cache in the clear data menu, restart the phone
